text: We've just had tea,'Nigel said.'Would you like the cookie to make you a fresh lot? I'd rather have whisky,'I told him.'Thought as much. Sun's nearly below the yard-managed to come to the stage of using each other's Christian names, I noted.
handwritten_text: We've just had tea,'Nigel said.'Would you like the cookie to make you a fresh lot? I'd rather have whisky,'I told him.'Thought as much. Sun's nearly below the yard-managed to come to the stage of using each other's Christian names, I noted.
